title: Transports over the last year in the Mallorca channel
description: Northward (positive) and southward (negative) water mass transports integrated for each transect monitored in the Mallorca Channels over the last year

distribution.title: Sub-regional Mediterranean sea indicators
distribution.description: Products used: delayed-time & L1 products from SOCIB gliders; Diagnostics: transports of water masses in the Balearic Channels (Ibiza & Mallorca Channels) for the last year & the last decade (since 2011); Water masses: recent & modified Atlantic Water (AWr & AWo), Western Intermediate Water (WIW), Levantine Intermediate Water (LIW), Western Mediterranean Deep Water (WDW)
